articles.author: Aramide Tinubu
articles.title: Andrew Scott Is Utterly Charmless in Netflix’s Somber ‘Ripley’: TV Review - Variety
articles.description: Andrew Scott's take on Tom Ripley in Netflix's 'Ripley' lacks the excitement of the film or the infamous novels.
articles.content: Patricia Highsmith’s 1955 crime novel, “The Talented Mr. Ripley,” is regarded as one of the greatest thrillers of all time. It has spawned several film adaptations, including Anthony Minghella’s “The… [+4973 chars]
